name: Make Haste Carrot Face
description:
My very first proper video game, made for MyFirstGameJam! Join Carrot Face on his journey to reclaim his nose, but be careful, if you don't make it back in time, you may find yourself melting in the hot sun!

Travel through three diverse worlds and enjoy the brilliant music created by Naraku! (https://leesoundofficial.itch.io/) Climb mountains, stomp on wizards and launch yourself through the air as a giant snowball! I had a lot of fun making this and learnt a lot doing so.

Come give it a shot! I hope you have as much fun playing it as I did testing it.

Default Keys:
WASD - movement
F - "charge" ability
